overview:
Barry Shurtz has 25 years of experience in the high tech industry, the last 11 years in the messaging, security, and compliance markets. As Vice President of Marketing with Sendmail, Shurtz leads all of Sendmailâ€™s corporate marketing, advertising, public and analysts relations and demand generation initiatives.

Prior to Sendmail, Shurtz served as the Director of Marketing at FaceTime Communications (now Actiance) where he helped the company become the dominant market leader of solutions for compliance, security, and management of instant messaging within the Global 1000.

Previously Shurtz held both technical and marketing positions with Inference Corporation, Virtual Microsystems and Sun Microsystems.

Mr. Shurtz holds a Bachelor of Science Degree in Business Information and Computing Systems, California State University, San Francisco.
